botMessages.message: Welcome to support via WhatsApp
Welcome to support via Facebook
What language would you prefer to chat in ?
Hi, I'm ASKR Technologies Virtual Assistant.
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. Let us start again.
Here is a recommended solution:
Here are some recommended solutions:
Summary:
{!Knowledge_Object.Summary}
Solution:
{!Knowledge_Object.Solution__c}
{!FirstName}, do your problem is solved ?
I'm delighted we were able to find a solution for you today.
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
I notice that we have a pending call, give a second and let me transfer with an agent.
Sorry, I didn't understand that.
I will need to know your First Name, Last Name, Email Address and Customer Number. Can you please enter it?

botDialogs.description: Bot ask to the user information to claim a warranty
botDialogs.label: Customer Information

botMessages.message: Unfortunately, you do not have any asset into the ASKR Technologies.
Unfortunately, your information does not exist into the ASKR Technologies.

botDialogs.description: If the data from the user does not exists into the database, finished the call
botDialogs.label: Contact Not Exists

botMessages.message: I am sorry to hear about your challenges, let me transfer you to an agent
Thanks for taking the time to chat. I’ve ended the conversation. To start a new conversation, enter some text.
Choose one of below:
Your situation is:
{!Utterance_Object.Description__c}
Your selection is :
{!Utterance_Object.Description__c}
Thank you {!FirstName}. How can I help you today?
{!FirstName}, for which of these products would you like to make a warranty claim?
You start the warranty claim process for this product : {!Asset_Object.Name}
With the problem of : {!KnowledgeTitle}
Would you like to explore a warranty replacement for the product?
No worries at all about moving forward with the claim today. The warranty will remain in effect until June 13, 2025. If you experience any issues later, we'll be happy to assist you then.
